name: Eduvannz
description: Eduvanz was founded in 2016 with the mission to empower students to make educated and informed decisions by providing free financial resources and unbiased advice.
features: Loans for School, College, Vocational courses, Upskilling courses & online Courses
Products on easy EMI's Electronics, Gaming, Wearables & Mobility
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Eduvanz provides low cost, smart loans to finance your skill based educational trainings.
ShortDescription: Eduvanz provides low cost, smart loans to finance your skill based educational trainings.
enhanced_description: Eduvanz, founded in 2016 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, is a financial technology service that provides low-cost, smart loans to finance various educational and skill-based training programs, including school, college, vocational, upskilling, and online courses. Beyond educational financing, Eduvanz also offers products on easy EMIs for electronics, gaming, wearables, and mobility. Positioned within the HR technology space as a software and service, its core mission, within an HR context, is to empower employees by providing free financial resources and unbiased advice, ultimately aiming to improve employee happiness, engagement, well-being, and satisfaction through access to funding for professional development and personal growth.
key_use_cases: Financing for employee upskilling and professional development courses
Providing financial support for employee education and training programs
Offering a financial wellness benefit focused on educational expenses for employees
Enabling access to skill-based educational training for employees
hr_functions_supported: Employee Benefits (specifically financial support for education)
Learning & Development (by facilitating access to educational courses)
roi_benefits: Facilitates employee skill development and retention
primary_users: Employees seeking financial assistance for education or skill development
HR professionals managing employee benefits and learning & development programs
